notifications.tryAgainLater: Please slow down and try again in a bit.
notifications.logoutFailed: Logout failed. Please try again later.
notifications.passwordResetEmailSent: If an account with that email exists, a reset link has been sent.
notifications.termsAgreementError: You must read and agree to the terms and conditions
notifications.registrationFailed: Registration failed. Please try again later.
notifications.usernameAlreadyExists: The username you selected is already taken. Please choose a different one.
notifications.emailAlreadyExists: The email you chose is already registered. Please try logging in or resetting your password.
notifications.unexpectedError: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
notifications.userInfoFetchError: Something went wrong. User info cannot be accessed at the moment.
notifications.quickBrewCarouselFetchError: Something went wrong. Recent brews cannot be accessed at the moment.
notifications.statsFetchError: Something went wrong. Stats cannot be accessed at the moment.
notifications.brewSaveError: Something went wrong. Brew was not saved. Please try again later.
notifications.coffeeSaveError: Something went wrong. Coffee was not saved. Please try again later.
notifications.coffeeDeleteError: Something went wrong. Coffee was not deleted. Please try again later.
notifications.coffeeArchiveError: Something went wrong. Coffee was not archived. Please try again later.
notifications.coffeeUnarchiveError: Something went wrong. Coffee was not unarchived. Please try again later.
notifications.roasterySaveError: Something went wrong. Roastery was not saved. Please try again later.
notifications.roasteryDeleteError: Something went wrong. Roastery was not deleted. Please try again later.

homePage.heroDescription: Unlock your best cups by logging, refining, and learning from every brew. Built for curious coffee lovers and everyday ritual makers.
homePage.heroButtonSubtext: Log in or register to begin

featureCards.sectionTitle: Built for Coffee Lovers, by Coffee Lovers
featureCards.sectionDescription: Whether you're a home barista or a coffee lover, you've come to the right place

trackBrews.title: Easily Track Your Brews
trackBrews.description: Log any brew in seconds — from espresso to pour over. Keep notes, grind size, and more to perfect your next cup.

visualizeStats.title: Visualize Your Coffee Journey
visualizeStats.description: See your brews as clear, interactive stats — favorite methods, top roasters, and consumption all in one dashboard.

centralizedData.title: Everything in One Place
centralizedData.description: Save every coffee you've tried, who roasted it, and how it tasted. Everything stays in one place so you can explore and remember.

validation.usernameInvalid: Username should include at least 3 characters
validation.passwordInvalid: Password should include at least 8 characters

inputs.termsAndConditions: I have read and agree to the terms and conditions

passwordResetPage.title: Reset Your Password
passwordResetPage.subtitle: Choose a new password to complete the process
passwordResetPage.linkInvalid: It looks like this link is no longer valid. Please request a new password reset link.
passwordResetPage.passwordResetSuccessful: Password reset successfully! You can now log in using your new password.

time.label: Time
time.error: Time must be in a format of 00:00 or 00:00:00

dose.label: Dose
dose.error: Dose must be bigger than 0 grams

yield.label: Yield
yield.error: Yield must be bigger than 0 grams

temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.error: Temperature must be a number between 0 and 100

message.title: Are you sure you want to delete this coffee?
message.description: All related brews and statistics will also be removed. This action cannot be undone.

message.title: Are you sure you want to delete this roastery?
message.description: All related coffees, brews and statistics will also be removed. This action cannot be undone.

name.label: Name
name.tooLong: Coffee name can't be longer than 70 characters

name.label: Name
name.tooLong: Roastery name can't be longer than 50 characters
